Package Game

Class Machine

  • java.lang.Object
    • Game.Card
      • Game.Machine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class Machine
extends Card
implements java.io.Serializable
    this class represent a Machine with its skills and cost to build
    See Also:

        stoneP - an int wich is the stone produce by the card

        woodP - an int wich is the wood produce by the card
        victoryPoint - the number of points won
